definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: Reasonably determining drainage modulus is very important for decreasing logging loss in diked area.
sentences.chinese: 合理确定圩区排涝模数对于降低涝灾损失有重要意义。

sentences.english: To reasonably determine drainage modulus is very important for decreasing logging loss in diked area.
sentences.chinese: 合理确定圩区排涝模数对于降低涝灾损失有重要意义。

sentences.english: It is universally available for low-lift drainage and irrigation projects in the plain diked areas.
sentences.chinese: 普遍适用于平原圩区低扬程排涝与灌溉的水利工程。

sentences.english: Considering the characteristics of local flood, it proposed the main measures in flood control and drainage system.
sentences.chinese: 针对迁安市洪水特征，提出防洪排涝措施。

sentences.english: The paper approaches to the urban waterlogging and drainage problem and puts forward the relevant view.
sentences.chinese: 对城市排涝与排水问题进行了探讨，提出有关见解。

sentences.english: It is believed that the rain-water and waterlogging drainages play a basic role for the safeguard of urban area.
sentences.chinese: 城市排涝与排水是关系到城市安全的基础工作。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
